text: The Stanley Correctional Institution is a state prison for men located in Stanley, Chippewa County, Wisconsin, owned and operated by the Wisconsin Department of Corrections. A maximum capacity of 1500 inmates are held at medium security. This facility was constructed in 1998 as a joint venture between the city of Stanley and the Dominion Corporation, then bought by the state in 2001. ==References== Category:Prisons in Wisconsin Category:Buildings and structures in Chippewa County, Wisconsin Category:1998 establishments in Wisconsin
title: Stanley Correctional Institution
